title: When will offline classes for Ist proff students begin? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ahhh…..I m too waiting for the clg to open…being the 1st year student I m desparately waiting for my clg life….I knew it's going suck me😜..but still Well I guess ……….there is nothing to guess 🙄….what is can do till now is just wait .. nothing much
